org.mitre.provenance.db.neo4j

Class Neo4JStorage

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mitre.provenance.db.neo4j.Neo4JStorage

  • public class Neo4JStorage
extends Object
    Storage layer for provenance. Handles the storage and loading of objects from Neo4J into the PLUS API.

    Note! If you want to report provenance, you probably shouldn't be using this class. To report provenance to a database either locally or remotely, please investigate the AbstractProvenanceClient class, and its child implementing classes.

    Author:
    moxious
    See Also:
    Neo4JPLUSObjectFactory

      Class that defines relationship types in Neo4J

    • Field Detail

      • log

        protected static Logger log

      • USE_CACHING

        protected static final boolean USE_CACHING
        Caching is a legacy feature from a previous implementation. It's probably not a good idea to use PLUS node caching because Neo4J offers better options itself. See Neo's documentation on memory mapping files for options on how to greatly speed up database access and keep nodes cached in memory: http://docs.neo4j.org/chunked/stable/configuration-io-examples.html
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • shutdown

        public static void shutdown()
        Shuts down the database; use of Neo4JStorage after this call results in undefined results.

      • getNPID

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.Node getNPID(String npid,
                                             boolean create)
        Get or create a node that refers to a non-provenance identifier. Must be called from within a transaction.
        Parameters:
        npid - the non-provenance identifier for the node
        create - if true, and the NPID doesn't exist, it will be created. If false, will return null if the NPID doesn't exist.
        Returns:
        the Node in the store corresponding to what was already present, or created.

      • getOwnedObjects

        public static ProvenanceCollection getOwnedObjects(PLUSActor actor,
                                                   User user,
                                                   int maxSetSize)
                                            throws PLUSException
        Get a list of PLUSObjects that this PLUSActor owns.
        Parameters:
        actor - the actor whose objects you are interested in
        user - the user requesting the data
        maxSetSize - the maximum number of items to return
        Returns:
        a list of the most recently registered PLUSObjects that this actor owns.
        Throws:
        PLUSException

      • fetchProvenance

        public static ProvenanceCollection fetchProvenance(String query,
                                                   Map<String,Object> params,
                                                   User user,
                                                   boolean includeNodes,
                                                   boolean includeEdges,
                                                   boolean includeNPEs)
                                            throws PLUSException
        Deprecated. 
        Execute a cypher query, and return a provenance collection according to the results.
        Parameters:
        query - the query to execute
        params - any bound parameters (if necessary)
        user - the user who is viewing the collection.
        includeNodes - if true, resulting collection will include any nodes, if false, they will be omitted.
        includeEdges - if true, resulting collection will include any edges, if false, they will be omitted.
        includeNPEs - if true, resulting collection will include any non-provenance edges, if false, they will be omitted.
        Returns:
        a provenance collection
        Throws:
        PLUSException - TODO

      • getMembers

        public static ProvenanceCollection getMembers(PLUSWorkflow wf,
                                              User user,
                                              int maximum)
        Parameters:
        wf - a PLUSWorkflow
        user - the user who is looking at this data
        maximum - the maximum number of nodes to return, up to Neo4JPLUSObjectFactory.MAX_OBJECTS
        Returns:
        a ProvenanceCollection consisting of the most recent objects participating in the workflow.
        Throws:
        PLUSException

      • assertDominates

        public static boolean assertDominates(PrivilegeClass a,
                                      PrivilegeClass b)
                               throws PLUSException
        Write a domination relationship between a and b, meaning that any privilege which b has, a also has.
        Parameters:
        a - a PrivilegeClass
        b - a PrivilegeClass
        Returns:
        true if successsful, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        PLUSException

                                          throws PLUSException

        Parameters:
        pc - the privilege class
        Returns:
        the node in the store corresponding to this privilege class.
        Throws:
        PLUSException

      • pathExists

        public boolean pathExists(PLUSObject one,
                          PLUSObject two)
                   throws PLUSException
        Determine whether the DAG contains a path from one object to another.
        Parameters:
        one - a PLUSObject in the DAG
        two - a PLUSObject in the DAG
        Returns:
        false if one or both of the objects isn't in the DAG. True if and only if there is a path from one object to the other. If both inputs are the same, returns true.
        Throws:
        PLUSException

      • pathExistsViaOperation

        public static boolean pathExistsViaOperation(PLUSObject one,
                                             PLUSObject two,
                                             String operation)
                                      throws PLUSException
        Do a DFS from one node to another to determine whether a path exists. The DFS only goes in one direction, either "bling" or "fling" specified by the operation.
        Parameters:
        one - a PLUSObject in the DAG
        two - a PLUSObject in the DAG
        operation - either "bling" or "fling"
        Returns:
        true if there is a path from one to two via that operation, false otherwise.
        Throws:
        PLUSException

        public static org.neo4j.graphdb.Node privilegeClassExistsById(String id)
                                                       throws PLUSException
        Check to see if a privilege class exists.
        Parameters:
        id - the ID of the privilege class
        Returns:
        a Node corresponding to its storage.
        Throws:
        PLUSException

      • delete

        public static boolean delete(PLUSObject o)
        Same as delete(o, true)

      • delete

        public static boolean delete(PLUSObject o,
                             boolean deleteIncidentDanglingEdges)
        Delete a PLUSObject from Neo4J.
        Parameters:
        o - the object to delete
        deleteIncidentDanglingEdges - if true, any remaining incident edges will also be deleted. If false, incident edges will not be deleted. NOTE: if the parameter is false, and incident edges still exist, this delete will fail and likely will throw an exception.
        Returns:

      • delete
